summary: This document is a real estate closing settlement statement and related wire/check records for the sale of a property in Bradford, NH, from 'Trustee of the' to Granite Reality LLC for $1,070,750.00. It details the flow of funds, including a large wire to the seller's trustee and payments to real estate agents, tax authorities, and legal services, managed by Hudkins Law PLLC.

persons.name: Jeffrey W. Roberts
persons.context: Listed as the manager/buyer representative for Granite Reality LLC, the purchasing entity in the real estate transaction.

persons.name: Jennifer Johnson
persons.context: Identified as the buyer's agent from Four Seasons Sothebys International Real Estate in the closing checklist.

persons.name: Margaret Weathers
persons.context: Identified as the listing agent from Four Seasons Sothebys International Real Estate in the closing checklist.

persons.name: Rebecca Russo
persons.context: Named as the processor for the real estate closing transaction in the checklist and recording sheet.

persons.name: Al Garcia
persons.context: Identified as the attorney representing the seller ('Trustee of the') in the closing checklist.

persons.name: Kayla Grimme
persons.context: Addressee of an internal email from Molly Betancourt forwarding a wire transfer confirmation for the seller's proceeds.

persons.name: Molly Betancourt
persons.context: Sent an internal email to Kayla Grimme forwarding confirmation of the seller proceeds wire transfer.

persons.name: Tammy Mello -Pontes
persons.context: Copied on an internal email regarding the wire transfer confirmation for the Granite Realty transaction.

persons.name: Margaret A. Jacobs
persons.context: The Law Office of Margaret A. Jacobs received a $350.00 check disbursement, listed as an 'Other Payoff' in the settlement.

connections.description: Roberts is identified as the Manager of Granite Reality LLC, the entity purchasing the property.
Johnson is the buyer's agent from Four Seasons Sothebys International Real Estate representing Granite Reality LLC in the purchase.
Weathers is the listing agent from Four Seasons Sothebys International Real Estate representing the seller, 'Trustee of the'.
Garcia is identified as the seller's attorney, representing the entity 'Trustee of the' in the real estate closing.
Russo is the processor for the closing, which is being handled by the law firm Hudkins Law PLLC.
Betancourt emailed Grimme (and cc'd Tammy Mello -Pontes) regarding a wire transfer confirmation, indicating a working relationship.

events.title: Property Closing
events.description: Real estate closing for the sale of a property in Bradford, NH, from 'Trustee of the' to Granite Reality LLC for $1,070,750.00.

events.title: Wire Deposit Received
events.description: A wire deposit of $994,279.12 from Granite Reality LLC was received into the Hudkins Law trust account to fund the purchase.

events.title: Disbursement of Funds
events.description: Multiple disbursements were made from the trust account, including a $1,012,322.07 wire to the seller's trustee, real estate commissions, tax payments, and legal fees.
personsInvolved: Four Seasons Sothebys International Real Estate

events.title: Seller Proceeds Wire Confirmation
events.description: Confirmation that the wire transfer of $1,012,322.07 for the seller's proceeds was successfully sent to the trustee at Rockland Trust.

keyFacts: Granite Reality LLC purchased a property in Bradford, NH for $1,070,750.00 from an entity named 'Trustee of the'.
The transaction involved a substantial wire transfer of $1,012,322.07 to the seller's trustee, identified only as 'Trustee of the'.
The law firm Hudkins Law PLLC managed the escrow account, receiving a $994,279.12 wire from the buyer and disbursing funds for taxes, commissions, title insurance, and legal fees.
Real estate agents from Four Seasons Sothebys International Real Estate (Jennifer Johnson and Margaret Weathers) were involved, receiving a commission of $50,287.50.
The document includes internal emails between staff (Molly Betancourt, Kayla Grimme, Tammy Mello -Pontes) confirming the wire transfer, indicating a professional real estate closing process.
